decision_conditions: The amendments and modification to the wording of the conditions listed below are considered to of a minor nature non material as the proposed wording would still secure the delivery of high quality development and would be unlikely to compromise the appropriate measures with respect to security, energy efficiency and the sustainability of the building. And hence, and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:

Condition 20 - Secure by Design The proposed development shall achieve a Certificate of Compliance in respect of the Secured by Design scheme, or alternatively achieve security standards (based on Secured by Design principles) to the satisfaction of the Metropolitan Police, details of which shall be provided to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The occupation of the building hereby approved shall cease within 6 months of failure to meet any of the following criteria:
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P1013.21 dated 28/07/2022 to allow for the triggers for submission of details of conditions 20; 27 & 31 to be amended as set out below in this decision letter (Erection of a new sixth form building, with associated access and parking, following demolition of the existing swimming pool.)
